verses.name: Luke 5:8
verses.text: When Simon Peter saw it, he fell down at Jesus’ knees, saying, Depart from me; for I am a sinful man, O Lord.

verses.name: Luke 5:9
verses.text: For he was astonished, and all that were with him, at the draught of the fishes which they had taken:

verses.name: Luke 5:10
verses.text: And so was also James, and John, the sons of Zebedee, which were partners with Simon. And Jesus said unto Simon, Fear not; from henceforth thou shalt catch men.

verses.name: Luke 5:11
verses.text: And when they had brought their ships to land, they forsook all, and followed him.
